WEIBO_NO=#{weiboNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WEIXIN_NO=#{weixinNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QQNUM=#{qqNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONSTELLATION=#{constellation,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select * from t_customers
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T_CUSTOMERS ( PWSYSID,SYS1ID,SYS2ID,SYS3ID , TRUENAME, PASSWORD, SEX, EMAIL, REGDATE, NICKNAME, CARDTYPE, CARD, USERTYPE, DISCOUNTDETAILID, IP, REGEMAIL, PHONE, TEL, INTEGRAL, NUM, BUYNUM, MALICE, INFO, STATUS, CREATETIME, LASTTIME, LASTUSER, DISCOUNTID, RENEWAL, RENEWALPWD, OLDUSERID, OLDMARK, UNIONUSERID, FCONFIGID, TNUMBER, LEVELS, AMOUNT, LNAME, ADRESS, EFFECT, CODE, UNIONDISCOUNT, THIRDDISCOUNT, USERDISCOUNT, CITYID, TYPE, LEGALPERSON, BUSINESSDATE, STARCAPITAL, EMPLOYEENUM, ASSET, YYZZURL, SFZURL, USERNAME, NATIVEPLACE, CUSTOMERCITY, DATASOURCE, CUSTOMERSOURCE, INDUSTRY, POSITION, INCOMELEVELS, INCOMERANGE, BUYPURPOSE, BUYFREQUENCY, TICKETPRICE, ATTENTIONSTAR, MARITALSTATUS, ISCHILDREN, CHILDRENBIRTHDAY, ISINTERNET, ATTENTIONTYPE, INTERESTS, INTERESTSOTHER, BIRTHDAY, CURRENTAMOUNT, EDUCATION, UNIONSETTLEMENTDISCOUNT, ISRENEWAL, REGPHONE, REGSAFETYINFO, LASTLOGINTIME, UNIONTYPE, DISCOUNTTYPE, LIMITSTARTTIME, LIMITENDTIME, SPREADTYPEID, REGISTEREDSOURCE, PHONE_SYS, PHONE_MODEL, PHONE_VERSION, CLIENT_VERSION, CHANNEL_ID, HEADIMG, DEVICETOKEN, LASTLOGINPHONETYPE, ACCS_FLAG, UNIONKEY, ERROR_CHANNEL_NAME, IOS_IDFA, LAST_LOGIN_CHANNEL, IFALIPAY, SPREADWAY, GRADE_NAME, GRADE_ID, CINDEX, CINDEX_UPDDATE , SYS_SOURCE,WEIBO_NO,WEIXIN_NO,QQNUM,CONSTELLATION,USERID_TOKEN) VALUES
( #{cus.pwsysId,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{cus.sys1Id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cus.sys2Id,jdbcType=BIGINT},#{cus.sys3Id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cus.truename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.regdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cus.nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.cardtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.card,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.usertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.discountdetailid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cus.ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.regemail,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.integral,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.num,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.buynum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.malice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.info,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cus.lasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cus.lastuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.discountid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.renewal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.renewalpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.olduserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.oldmark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.unionuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.fconfigid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.tnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.levels,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.lname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.effect,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.uniondiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.thirddiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.userdiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.cityid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.type,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.legalperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.businessdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cus.starcapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.employeenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.asset,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.yyzzurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.sfzurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.nativeplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.customercity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.customersource,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.incomelevels,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.incomerange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.buypurpose,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.buyfrequency,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.ticketprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.attentionstar,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.maritalstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.ischildren,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.childrenbirthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.isinternet,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.attentiontype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.interests,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.interestsother,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.currentamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.unionsettlementdiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.isrenewal,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.regphone,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.regsafetyinfo,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.lastlogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cus.uniontype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.discounttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.limitstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cus.limitendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cus.spreadtypeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.registeredsource,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.phoneSys,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.phoneModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.phoneVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.clientVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cus.headimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.devicetoken,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.lastloginphonetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.accsFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.unionkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.errorChannelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.iosIdfa,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.lastLoginChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.ifalipay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.spreadway,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cus.gradeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cus.gradeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cus.cindex}, #{cus.cindexUpddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} ,#{cus.sysSource},#{cus.weiboNo},#{cus.weixinNo},#{cus.qqNum},#{cus.constellation},#{cus.useridToken} )

if.test: ( ( regS != null and regS != '' ) or ( regE != null and regE != '' ) )

mapper.select: SELECT count(1) FROM T_CUSTOMERS c

SELECT c.ID,c.PWSYSID, CONVERT(c.TRUENAME USING utf8) as TRUENAME , c.SYS_SOURCE, (SELECT IFNULL(sum(1),0) FROM t_orders_info oinfo1 WHERE oinfo1.CUSTOMERSID = c.PWSYSID and oinfo1.pay_status='已支付' ) as PAY_NUM ,
(SELECT if (IFNULL(count(1),0)>0 ,1, 0) FROM t_orders_info oinfo1 WHERE oinfo1.CUSTOMERSID = c.PWSYSID and oinfo1.pay_status='已支付' ) as VIP_STATUS , (SELECT IFNULL(sum(oinfo1.ORDER_SUMPRICE),0) FROM t_orders_info oinfo1 WHERE oinfo1.CUSTOMERSID = c.PWSYSID and oinfo1.pay_status='已支付' ) as PAY_TOTAL_PRICE ,
(SELECT oinfo1.PAY_TIME FROM t_orders_info oinfo1 WHERE oinfo1.CUSTOMERSID = c.PWSYSID and oinfo1.pay_status='已支付' order by oinfo1.PAY_TIME desc LIMIT 0,1 ) as LAST_PAY_DATE ,
c.GRADE_NAME ,
c.SHIELD, (SELECT cg.GNAME FROM t_customer_grade cg WHERE cg.ID = c.GRADE_ID) AS GNAME FROM t_customers c
order by c.id asc
mapper.update:
update t_customers cus set cus.SHIELD = IF(cus.SHIELD=1,0 ,1) where id in
#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT CUS.ID , (SELECT cg.GNAME FROM t_customer_grade cg WHERE cg.ID = cus.GRADE_ID) AS GRADE_NAME , IFNULL(CUS.INTEGRAL ,0 ) AS INTEGRAL, (SELECT NAME FROM SYS_DICTIONARIE WHERE PID = 64 AND CODE = CUS.SYS_SOURCE ) AS SYS_SOURCE,
(SELECT OD.PAY_TIME FROM T_ORDERS_INFO OD WHERE OD.CUSTOMERSID =CUS.PWSYSID AND OD.PAY_STATUS ='已支付' ORDER BY ID DESC LIMIT 0 ,1 ) AS LAST_PAY_TIME ,
IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(OD.ORDER_SUMPRICE) FROM T_ORDERS_INFO OD WHERE OD.CUSTOMERSID =CUS.PWSYSID AND OD.PAY_STATUS ='已支付' AND DATE_FORMAT( OD.PAY_TIME , '%Y') = DATE_FORMAT( NOW() , '%Y') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( OD.PAY_TIME , '%Y') ) ,0 ) AS SJZF_YEAR ,
(SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_ORDERS_INFO OD WHERE OD.CUSTOMERSID =CUS.PWSYSID AND OD.PAY_STATUS ='已支付' ) AS PAY_COUNT ,
IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(OD.ORDER_SUMPRICE) FROM T_ORDERS_INFO OD WHERE OD.CUSTOMERSID =CUS.PWSYSID AND OD.PAY_STATUS ='已支付' ) ,0 ) AS SJZF_TOTAL ,
IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(OD.PROS_NUM) FROM T_ORDERS_INFO OD WHERE OD.CUSTOMERSID =CUS.PWSYSID AND OD.PAY_STATUS ='已支付' ) ,0 ) AS PRO_TOTAL ,
IFNULL( (SELECT SUM(OD.ORDER_SUMPRICE) FROM T_ORDERS_INFO OD WHERE OD.CUSTOMERSID =CUS.PWSYSID AND OD.PAY_STATUS ='未支付' ) ,0 ) AS NOT_PAY_TOTAL ,
CUS.CINDEX , (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM T_EWALLET EW WHERE EW.CUSTOMERSID = CUS.PWSYSID AND EW.PAY_PRICE > 0 AND EW.FLAG = 0 ) AS RECHARGE_COUNT,
(SELECT SUM(EW.PAY_PRICE) FROM T_EWALLET EW WHERE EW.CUSTOMERSID = CUS.PWSYSID AND EW.PAY_PRICE > 0 AND EW.FLAG = 0 ) AS RECHARGE_SUMPRICE ,
( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( NOTE.NAME) FROM T_CUSTOMER_JOIN_NOTE JOIN_NOTE LEFT JOIN T_CUSTOMER_NOTE NOTE ON JOIN_NOTE.NOTE_ID = NOTE.ID WHERE JOIN_NOTE.CUSTOMER_ID = CUS.ID ) AS NOTE , ( SELECT GROUP_CONCAT( JOIN_NOTE.ID) FROM T_CUSTOMER_JOIN_NOTE JOIN_NOTE LEFT JOIN T_CUSTOMER_NOTE NOTE ON JOIN_NOTE.NOTE_ID = NOTE.ID WHERE JOIN_NOTE.CUSTOMER_ID = CUS.ID ) AS JOIN_NOTEID, cus.PWSYSID ,cus.GRADE_NAME from t_customers cus where cus.id= #{customersid} ;

update.foreach:
update t_customers
TRUENAME = #{cus.truename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{cus.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{cus.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{cus.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGDATE = #{cus.regdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
NICKNAME = #{cus.nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARDTYPE = #{cus.cardtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CARD = #{cus.card,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERTYPE = #{cus.usertype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
DISCOUNTDETAILID = #{cus.discountdetailid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IP = #{cus.ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGEMAIL = #{cus.regemail,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PHONE = #{cus.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TEL = #{cus.tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTEGRAL = #{cus.integral,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
NUM = #{cus.num,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUYNUM = #{cus.buynum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
MALICE = #{cus.malice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INFO = #{cus.info,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STATUS = #{cus.status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATETIME = #{cus.createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LASTTIME = #{cus.lasttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LASTUSER = #{cus.lastuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISCOUNTID = #{cus.discountid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RENEWAL = #{cus.renewal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RENEWALPWD = #{cus.renewalpwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OLDUSERID = #{cus.olduserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OLDMARK = #{cus.oldmark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIONUSERID = #{cus.unionuserid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FCONFIGID = #{cus.fconfigid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TNUMBER = #{cus.tnumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LEVELS = #{cus.levels,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
AMOUNT = #{cus.amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LNAME = #{cus.lname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADRESS = #{cus.adress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EFFECT = #{cus.effect,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CODE = #{cus.code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIONDISCOUNT = #{cus.uniondiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
THIRDDISCOUNT = #{cus.thirddiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
USERDISCOUNT = #{cus.userdiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CITYID = #{cus.cityid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
TYPE = #{cus.type,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LEGALPERSON = #{cus.legalperson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESSDATE = #{cus.businessdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STARCAPITAL = #{cus.starcapital,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EMPLOYEENUM = #{cus.employeenum,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ASSET = #{cus.asset,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
YYZZURL = #{cus.yyzzurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SFZURL = #{cus.sfzurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERNAME = #{cus.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NATIVEPLACE = #{cus.nativeplace,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMERCITY = #{cus.customercity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DATASOURCE = #{cus.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOMERSOURCE = #{cus.customersource,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INDUSTRY = #{cus.industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
POSITION = #{cus.position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INCOMELEVELS = #{cus.incomelevels,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INCOMERANGE = #{cus.incomerange,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUYPURPOSE = #{cus.buypurpose,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
BUYFREQUENCY = #{cus.buyfrequency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TICKETPRICE = #{cus.ticketprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTENTIONSTAR = #{cus.attentionstar,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARITALSTATUS = #{cus.maritalstatus,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ISCHILDREN = #{cus.ischildren,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CHILDRENBIRTHDAY = #{cus.childrenbirthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISINTERNET = #{cus.isinternet,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTENTIONTYPE = #{cus.attentiontype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTERESTS = #{cus.interests,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INTERESTSOTHER = #{cus.interestsother,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BIRTHDAY = #{cus.birthday,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURRENTAMOUNT = #{cus.currentamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
EDUCATION = #{cus.education,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIONSETTLEMENTDISCOUNT = #{cus.unionsettlementdiscount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ISRENEWAL = #{cus.isrenewal,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REGPHONE = #{cus.regphone,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REGSAFETYINFO = #{cus.regsafetyinfo,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LASTLOGINTIME = #{cus.lastlogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UNIONTYPE = #{cus.uniontype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DISCOUNTTYPE = #{cus.discounttype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LIMITSTARTTIME = #{cus.limitstarttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LIMITENDTIME = #{cus.limitendtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SPREADTYPEID = #{cus.spreadtypeid,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REGISTEREDSOURCE = #{cus.registeredsource,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PHONE_SYS = #{cus.phoneSys,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PHONE_MODEL = #{cus.phoneModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE_VERSION = #{cus.phoneVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLIENT_VERSION = #{cus.clientVersion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHANNEL_ID = #{cus.channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
HEADIMG = #{cus.headimg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICETOKEN = #{cus.devicetoken,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LASTLOGINPHONETYPE = #{cus.lastloginphonetype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ACCS_FLAG = #{cus.accsFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UNIONKEY = #{cus.unionkey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERROR_CHANNEL_NAME = #{cus.errorChannelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IOS_IDFA = #{cus.iosIdfa,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAST_LOGIN_CHANNEL = #{cus.lastLoginChannel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IFALIPAY = #{cus.ifalipay,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SPREADWAY = #{cus.spreadway,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
GRADE_NAME = #{cus.gradeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GRADE_ID = #{cus.gradeId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
CINDEX = #{cus.cindex},
CINDEX_UPDDATE = #{cus.cindexUpddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SHIELD=#{cus.shield,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SYS_SOURCE=#{cus.sysSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEIBO_NO=#{cus.weiboNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WEIXIN_NO=#{cus.weixinNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{cus.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

mapper.select: select count(1) as totalCount from t_customers

SELECT
c.ID, c.SHIELD, c.CREATETIME, c.PWSYSID, c.GRADE_ID, IFNULL( CONVERT(c.TRUENAME USING utf8) ,'') as TRUENAME , IFNULL( CONVERT(c.USERNAME USING utf8) ,'') as USERNAME , c.SYS_SOURCE, c.PHONE , c.EMAIL , ifnull (TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, c.BIRTHDAY, CURDATE()) , 0 )as AGE, c.SEX , c.CARD , c.CARDTYPE ,c.USERTYPE , IFNULL( CONVERT(c.NICKNAME USING utf8) ,'') as NICKNAME
, GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT od.ORDER_SOURCE ) as ORDER_SOURCE , GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT od.pros) as ORDER_PRODUCTS , GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT od.pro_types) as ORDER_PRODUCT_TYPES , GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT od.pro_typesa) as ORDER_PRODUCT_TYPESA , GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT CONVERT( od.ARTISTS_INTRODUCED USING utf8) ) as ORDER_ARTISTS_INTRODUCED , GROUP_CONCAT( DISTINCT od.pro_city) as ORDER_PRODUCT_CITYS, ( SELECT if (IFNULL(count(1),0)>0 ,1, 0) FROM t_orders_info oinfo1 WHERE oinfo1.CUSTOMERSID = c.PWSYSID and oinfo1.pay_status='已支付' and ISCUMPUTING=0 and id <= #{orderIdMax} ) as VIP_STATUS ,
(SELECT IFNULL(sum(oinfo1.ORDER_SUMPRICE),0) FROM t_orders_info oinfo1 WHERE oinfo1.CUSTOMERSID = c.PWSYSID and oinfo1.pay_status='已支付' and ISCUMPUTING=0 and id <= #{orderIdMax} ) as PAY_TOTAL_PRICE ,
(SELECT IFNULL(sum(oinfo1.ORDER_SUMPRICE),0) FROM t_orders_info oinfo1 WHERE oinfo1.CUSTOMERSID = c.PWSYSID and oinfo1.pay_status='已支付' and ISCUMPUTING=0 and id <= #{orderIdMax} ) as TRADER_TOTAL_PRICE,
(SELECT IFNULL(sum(oinfo1.PROS_Num),0) FROM t_orders_info oinfo1 WHERE oinfo1.CUSTOMERSID = c.PWSYSID and oinfo1.pay_status='已支付' and ISCUMPUTING=0 and id <= #{orderIdMax} ) as BUY_PRODUCT_TOTAL_COUNT,
(SELECT IFNULL(count(1),0) FROM t_orders_info oinfo1 WHERE oinfo1.CUSTOMERSID = c.PWSYSID and oinfo1.pay_status='已支付' and ISCUMPUTING=0 and id <= #{orderIdMax} ) as PAYCOUNT ,
(SELECT IFNULL(count(1),0) FROM t_orders_info oinfo1 WHERE oinfo1.CUSTOMERSID = c.PWSYSID and LOCATE('已退票', oinfo1.ORDER_STATUS ) >0 and ISCUMPUTING=0 and id <= #{orderIdMax} ) as REF_COUNT ,
(SELECT oinfo1.PAY_TIME FROM t_orders_info oinfo1 WHERE oinfo1.CUSTOMERSID = c.PWSYSID and oinfo1.pay_status='已支付' and ISCUMPUTING=0 and id <= #{orderIdMax}
order by oinfo1.PAY_TIME desc LIMIT 0,1 ) as LAST_PAY_DATE ,
(SELECT IFNULL(sum(oinfo1.ORDER_SUMPRICE),0) FROM t_orders_info oinfo1 WHERE oinfo1.CUSTOMERSID = c.PWSYSID and oinfo1.pay_status='已支付' and ISCUMPUTING=0 and id <= #{orderIdMax} and oinfo1.CREATE_TIME >= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT( current_timestamp(),'%Y' ),'-01-01 00:00:00') and oinfo1.CREATE_TIME <= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT( current_timestamp(),'%Y' )+1,'-01-01 00:00:00') ) as TRADER_TOTAL_PRICE_IN_YEAR ,
(SELECT IFNULL(sum(1),0) FROM t_orders_info oinfo1 WHERE oinfo1.CUSTOMERSID = c.PWSYSID and oinfo1.pay_status='已支付' and ISCUMPUTING=0 and id <= #{orderIdMax} and oinfo1.CREATE_TIME >= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT( current_timestamp(),'%Y' ),'-01-01 00:00:00') and oinfo1.CREATE_TIME <= CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT( current_timestamp(),'%Y' )+1,'-01-01 00:00:00') ) as TRADER_TOTAL_COUNT_IN_YEAR ,
(SELECT IFNULL(count(oinfo1.ORDER_SUMPRICE),0) FROM t_orders_info oinfo1 WHERE oinfo1.CUSTOMERSID = c.PWSYSID and LOCATE('已退票', oinfo1.ORDER_STATUS ) >0 and ISCUMPUTING=0 and id <= #{orderIdMax} ) as FAILURE_TRANSACTION_TOTAL_PRICE ,
( select IFNULL( sum(od.REFUN_PRICE),0) from t_orders_info od where od.PAY_STATUS='已退款' and ISCUMPUTING=0 and id <= #{orderIdMax} and od.customersid = c.PWSYSID ) as REF_PRICE ,
( select IFNULL( count(od.id),0) from t_orders_info od where od.PAY_STATUS!='已支付' and ISCUMPUTING=0 and id <= #{orderIdMax} and ( od.ORDER_STATUS ='用户已删除' or od.ORDER_STATUS ='无效' ) and od.customersid =c.PWSYSID ) as CANCEL_TOTAL
, (select IFNULL(sum(PAY_PRICE),0) from t_ewallet where customersid = c.PWSYSID and ISCUMPUTING=0 and id <= #{ewalletIdMax} ) as EWALLET_TOTAL_PRICE
FROM t_customers c left join t_orders_info od on c.PWSYSID = od.CUSTOMERSID where 1=1
and c.id in
#{id}
group by c.ID, c.SHIELD, c.CREATETIME, c.PWSYSID, c.GRADE_ID, c.TRUENAME , c.USERNAME , c.SYS_SOURCE, c.PHONE , c.EMAIL , c.BIRTHDAY , c.PWSYSID , c.SEX ,c.CARD , c.CARDTYPE ,c.USERTYPE ,c.NICKNAME order by c.id asc
mapper.update:
update t_customers set
ACTIVE_INDEX = #{activeIndex} ,
RFM_INDEX = #{rfmIndex} ,
RECENCY_INDEX = RECENCY_INDEX + #{recencyIndex} ,
CINDEX = ACTIVE_INDEX + RECENCY_INDEX +RFM_INDEX where PWSYSID = #{pwsysId}
mapper.select: select id from t_customers where id >#{maxid} order by id asc
select PWSYSID AS id from t_customers where PWSYSID >#{maxid} order by id asc
select count(cus.ID) as size from t_customers cus where GRADE_ID != #{gradeId} and cus.cindex >= #{ibegin} and cus.cindex <= #{iend}
select ID from t_customers cus where id <425368
SELECT count(1) FROM T_CUSTOMERS cus

select cus.ID , cus.PHONE ,CONVERT(cus.TRUENAME USING utf8) as TRUENAME , cus.EMAIL , ifnull( cus.CRM_INTEGRAL_OPT ,0) as CRM_INTEGRAL_OPT, ifnull(cus.CRM_INTEGRAL_SYS,0 ) as CRM_INTEGRAL_SYS, ifnull( cus.CRM_INTEGRAL_CONSUME,0 ) as CRM_INTEGRAL_CONSUME , ifnull(cus.CRM_INTEGRAL_USABLE,0) as CRM_INTEGRAL_USABLE ,cus.CRM_INTEGRAL_STATUS ,cus.INTEGRAL from t_customers cus
order by id asc

if.test: (stime != null and stime !='' )or (etime != null and etime !='' )

mapper.update:
update t_customers cus set cus.CRM_INTEGRAL_STATUS=#{status} where id in
#{id}

update t_customers cus set cus.CRM_INTEGRAL_USABLE=0 , cus.CRM_INTEGRAL_SYS=0 where id in
#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT C.ID ,C.CRM_INTEGRAL_CONSUME , C.CRM_INTEGRAL_SYS , C.CRM_INTEGRAL_USABLE , GRADE.GNAME , IFNULL(GRADE.INTEGRAL_MULTIPLE,1) AS INTEGRAL_MULTIPLE , C.ACTIVE_INDEX , C.RECENCY_INDEX FROM T_CUSTOMERS C LEFT JOIN T_CUSTOMER_GRADE GRADE ON C.GRADE_ID = GRADE.ID WHERE C.PWSYSID IN
#{id}
select id from t_customers order by id asc limit #{pageNo},#{pageSize}
mapper.update:
update t_customers
TRUENAME = #{truename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PASSWORD = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EMAIL = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REGDATE = #{regdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
NICKNAME = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CARDTYPE = #{cardtype,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

where PWSYSID = #{pwsysId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ifnull( min(id) , 0 ) as LASTMINID from t_customers where GRADE_ID=#{gradeId} and GRAGE_UPDATE_LAST > date_sub(curdate(),interval 0 day)
select id from t_customers where GRADE_ID=#{gradeid} and id >#{maxid} and GRAGE_UPDATE_LAST > date_sub(curdate(),interval 0 day) order by id
select count(1) from t_customers where GRADE_ID = #{gradeid} and id >#{maxid}
select id from t_customers where PWSYSID = #{pwSysid}
